game.title: Verdant Horizon
game.synopsis: The game is a survival adventure set in a forgotten world where nature reigns supreme. Our protagonist must navigate this treacherous landscape while overcoming various environmental challenges and terrifying creatures that lurk in every corner.
game.beginning: The game begins with our protagonist waking up, completely bewildered and lost in a dense forest. With no memory of how they got there, the only option is to venture deeper into the wilderness to find civilization and safety.
game.ending: Towards the end, our protagonist finally breaks through the last line of the forest, only to find a broken civilization that has returned to nature. With understanding dawning upon them, they decide to set roots down in this peaceful coexistence of man and nature, finding harmony in this vibrant wilderness.
